Slough.gov.uk - Home

Council Tax

We are facing extremely high volumes of calls.

Council Tax bill

If you are calling about the balance on your annual council tax bill, please note, any payments received on or after 22 February 2019 are not included in this bill and will be reflected on your account. The fastest way to check this is by signing up and logging into the self-serve system.

Single Person Discount

If you are calling about the Single Person Discount letter you have received, please note this form needs to be completed and returned by the 30 April 2019. Or you can complete the Single Person Discount Review form online.

News

11 March 2019

A Slap in Time

A new documentary film will explore the history of Panjabi Wrestling, from India to the United Kingdom.
20 February 2019

Just keep swimming, just keep swimming…

Slough Borough Council is celebrating the completion and filling of the two pools at the brand new leisure centre on Farnham Road.

Slough.gov.uk - Home

School Admissions Year 7 allocations

If you are unable to log in to the School admissions portal, you can email admissionshelpline@slough.gov.uk to accept or decline your offer. Please make sure you put your child’s full name and data of birth the subject line.
